name: Attack on I-Ching  进击的易经
detailed_description:
Attack on I-Ching is an educational game, an ideal introduction to the traditional Chinese I-Ching culture created for young people around the world!

You are reading this page now because you are not only interested in learning I-Ching. Maybe you have tried to learn it before, but you can't remember even sixty? That is completely normal, so don't worry! Learning mysterious I-Ching, especially rising to the height of philosophy, can be daunting. Using mystery like the I-Ching, full of strange symbols, you may not even know where to start.

You need a learning tool that will interest you to cope with the boring challenge! Most importantly, this will help you get more magical rewards! .

It's not just educational software - it's a comprehensive RPG game designed to keep you engaged. Through the game, you will learn the Book of Changes in an unprecedented way.

In this process, you will learn the sixty-four images of the Book of Changes at a steady pace. Each chapter has a new set of characters, and your success will be tested on the battlefield! If your knowledge reaches the standard, then you will win in an exciting strategic battle. If you fail unfortunately, you have the opportunity to revisit specific chapters and review your knowledge.

What is I-Ching?

I-Ching is an ancient Chinese classic about the changes in Vientiane in the world. It is a profound dialectic philosophy book. In its practical application, it is also a magical magic book for divination. The divination of the Book of Changes was called "Di Shu" in ancient China. "Di Shu" is to predict the development of future events, and " I-Ching" summarizes the laws of these predictions to form philosophical theory. " I-Ching" covers everything, humanity, social development, and mysterious culture. It is an outstanding representative of Chinese culture; it is the most subtle and all-encompassing, and it is also the source of Chinese civilization. Its contents cover many fields such as philosophy, politics, life, literature, art, science, etc. It is the first of the group, the classics of Confucianism and Taoism.

Game Features:

An exciting story based on learning the traditional Chinese culture of I-Ching culture. When the characters in the story learn the Sixty-fourth of the Yijing, you will learn with them!
Learn each one and explain its name, image, and rhetoric in detail. When you pass the game, the I-Ching sixty-four, you want to forget, you can't forget! .
For the uncommon Chinese characters, the pronunciation is indicated in Chinese Pinyin.
The audio voice skills demonstrate the pronunciation of each 。.
Each protagonist has a beautifully rendered vertical painting.
Enemies with the characteristics of I-Ching, destroy them through the original spirit system, and strengthen your memory of the Book of Changes!
Exciting gameplay and familiar RPG elements - gain experience and upgrade characters, collect items, complete missions, and fight! There is even a magical I-Ching divination system!
Battle and quizzes in the game to verify that you have mastered the learning content.

Let the Attack on I-Ching, let's get started now! !
